quests.desc: Welcome to TextWorld! Here is how to play! First step, attempt to move west. And then, make an effort to take a trip south. Then, pick up the key from the case. And then, make an attempt to head east. With that over with, unlock the chest. Alright, thanks!

infos.name: bedchamber
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a bedchamber. A standard kind of place.

 You see [if c_0 is locked]a locked[else if c_0 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] chest.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The chest contains [a list of things in the c_0]![end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] The chest is empty, what a horrible day![end if] You can make out [if c_2 is locked]a locked[else if c_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] basket nearby.[if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The basket contains [a list of things in the c_2]. I mean, just wow! Isn't TextWorld just the best?[end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] What a letdown! The basket is empty![end if] Look out! It's a- oh, never mind, it's just a desk. The desk is typical.[if there is something on the s_0] On the desk you can make out [a list of things on the s_0].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0] But there isn't a thing on it.[end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: shower
infos.desc:
You've entered a shower. You begin looking for stuff.

 You see [if c_1 is locked]a locked[else if c_1 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] case here.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The case contains [a list of things in the c_1].[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if]

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. There is an unblocked exit to the north.

infos.name: office
infos.desc:
You've entered an office. You decide to just list off a complete list of everything you see in the room, because hey, why not?



 There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading north. There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gateway leading west. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: closet
infos.desc:
This might come as a shock to you, but you've just come into a closet.

 You see [if c_3 is locked]a locked[else if c_3 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] display in the corner.[if c_3 is open and there is something in the c_3] The display contains [a list of things in the c_3].[end if][if c_3 is open and the c_3 contains nothing] The display is empty, what a horrible day![end if]

 There is [if d_3 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] door leading west. There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gateway leading east. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: study
infos.desc:
You arrive in a study. A typical one.



 There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading south. There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading west. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north.

infos.name: scullery
infos.desc:
You've entered an ordinary room. Your mind races to think of what kind of room would be ordinary. And then it hits you. Of course. You're in the scullery.

 You make out a rack. The rack is typical.[if there is something on the s_1] On the rack you make out [a list of things on the s_1].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1] But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of garbage. Aw, here you were, all excited for there to be things on it![end if]

 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading east. There is an unblocked exit to the west.

infos.name: launderette
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a launderette.

 You bend down to tie your shoe. When you stand up, you notice a drawer.[if c_4 is open and there is something in the c_4] The drawer contains [a list of things in the c_4].[end if][if c_4 is open and the c_4 contains nothing] The drawer is empty! What a waste of a day![end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: cubicle
infos.desc:
You're now in the cubicle. You start to take note of what's in the room.



 There is [if d_3 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] door leading east. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: spare room
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a spare room. A normal one. You decide to just list off a complete list of everything you see in the room, because hey, why not?



There is an unblocked exit to the east.

infos.name: playroom
infos.desc:
You've entered a playroom.



There is an unguarded exit to the south.

infos.name: gate
infos.desc: The gate looks well-built. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: gateway
infos.desc: The gateway looks robust. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: portal
infos.desc: The portal looks towering. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: door
infos.desc: it's a well-built door [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: chest
infos.desc: The chest looks strong, and impossible to open. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: case
infos.desc: The case looks strong, and impossible to bash open. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: basket
infos.desc: The basket looks strong, and impossible to break open. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: display
infos.desc: The display looks strong, and impossible to crack open. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: drawer
infos.desc: The drawer looks strong, and impossible to bash open. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: desk
infos.desc: The desk is wobbly.

infos.name: rack
infos.desc: The rack is wobbly.

infos.name: berry
infos.desc: The berry looks appealing.

infos.name: garlic clove
infos.desc: You couldn't pay me to eat that usual thing.

infos.name: key
infos.desc: The metal of the key is polished.

objective: Hey, thanks for coming over to the TextWorld today, there is something I need you to do for me. First thing I need you to do is to make an attempt to head west. Following that, make an attempt to take a trip south. Then, take the key from the case. And then, make an attempt to move east. After that, unlock the chest within the bedchamber. And if you do that, you're the winner!

main_quest.desc: Hey, thanks for coming over to the TextWorld today, there is something I need you to do for me. First thing I need you to do is to make an attempt to head west. Following that, make an attempt to take a trip south. Then, take the key from the case. And then, make an attempt to move east. After that, unlock the chest within the bedchamber. And if you do that, you're the winner!
